attributes.action: request that the official logo to the London 2012 Olympics is redesigned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The official logo for the London 2012 Olympics is misjudged, inappropriate and embarrassing. It does not represent the United Kingdom, London, their people, or the Olympics. It should be redesigned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
